-e ---

𒍪 𓎡 can kennen reckon 𓂋 𓐍 𓏜 erkennen

𓂋 𓐍 𓏜 reckon erkennen "know"

𓂋 𓐍 arigh > arif عرف I know "arrive at"

𓂋 𓐍 Karich begreifen

𓂋 𓐍 𓏜 rechnen count

𓁹 𓂋 ראה ra'á رَأَى raʾā "łook" reckon

Heurekamun

… the knowledgeable of the herdsman reciting the boat song of water: 𓎛 𓍛 𓊃 𓅱 𓊛 𓈗 chanson hamar 𓊛 𓈗 <> Haraham <> 𓍛 ḥm 𓍛 kómer כֹּמֶר 'priest'

Water Song in The Herdman's Tale: 𓎛 𓂝 𓀠 𓂓 𓏤 𓏪 Heureka 𓎛 𓂝 𓀠 𓂓 𓏤 𓏪 𓀀 𓀸 𓏲 𓀀 𓏪 𓅷 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓂺 𓀀 ḥ Ꜥ kꜣʷʲ mn ʲ w ṯ ≈ h l ḥ m q w ṯ
